item.title: Metalcore playlist for 12/2013
item.description: Including: 2013.07.08 The Word Alive, Affiance, In Hearts Wake, Parkway Drive, Periphery, Red Handed Denial, The Amity Affliction, The Devil Wears Prada, The Ghost Inside, The Human Abstract.
